title: FS: Clark Griffith (Batting) Sweet Cap 350/460 SGC 4
author: peanuts

posts.post_title: FS: Clark Griffith (Batting) Sweet Cap 350/460 SGC 4
posts.post_content:
A rare instance of me selling a T206! Need to move some extraneous stuff to pay for honeymoon, and I already have a 350/460 back in the collection. 

Fantastic copy. Centering is decent, registration is fantastic, no surface staining/creases/chipping/paper loss at all. Good edges as well - definitely a strong eye appeal card. 

Price: $450
